Items.Title: Application number G 240065 GAX (Kingsbridge Armory ESDC Grant) submitted by the City of New York (the “City”) by and through its Economic Development Corporation requesting from the New York City Council a favorable resolution in support of the City’s application for funding from the New York State Empire State Development Corporation (“ESDC”), pursuant to Section 16-n of the ESDC Act, under the Restore New York Communities Initiative in connection with the redevelopment of the Kingsbridge Armory (Block 3247, Lot 10), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 7, Council District 14.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Kingsbridge Armory ESDC Grant, Bronx (G 240065 GAX).
